requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Competition limited to EAGLE BOA holders under NAICS 561210 by the RFP close date.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Intro Section 1.1 states: 'We are an approved EAGLE BOA holder under NAICS 561210 as of September 2024.'
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.15 - Eligibility verification checklist

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Incumbent is KBRwyle under contract W52P1J-12-G-0061-0001.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Capture Strategy subsection discusses incumbent KBRwyle history and competitive differentiators from our approach.
gaps: No explicit contract number reference in executive summary
improvement_suggestions: Add contract number W52P1J-12-G-0061-0001 in Executive Summary for completeness
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Capture Guide p.35 - Competitive intelligence gathering

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Questions due 2025-10-14 1400 EST; proposals due 2025-10-28 1400 EST.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Proposal Schedule table in Section 1.2 lists both deadlines correctly with internal milestone tracking.
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.25 - Schedule management critical path

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Technical Volume limited to 25 pages, 11 pt font, 1 inch margins; PDF only.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Current draft PDF is 27 pages including cover page and table of contents.
improvement_suggestions: Condense staffing narrative section by 1 page
Remove redundant graphics in maintenance execution section
Consider appendix for detailed technical specifications
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.45 - Format compliance checklist

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Offer shall remain valid for 180 days from proposal due date.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: NOT FOUND - No explicit validity statement located in any volume.
improvement_suggestions: Insert validity statement in transmittal letter: 'This proposal remains valid for 180 days from October 28, 2025'
Add to Executive Summary for prominence
Reference Shipley p.30 contractual commitments tracking
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.30 - Contractual commitments tracking

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Best Value tradeoff among Technical, Past Performance, and Cost/Price.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Executive Summary mentions best value approach aligning technical excellence, performance history, and competitive pricing.
gaps: Could explicitly restate evaluation factor hierarchy
improvement_suggestions: Add explicit sentence: 'We recognize Technical outweighs Past Performance; combined non-price factors significantly outweigh Cost/Price'
Reference specific evaluation methodology from M.1
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Capture Guide p.25 - Source selection strategy analysis

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Technical Factor sub-factors: Staffing Approach, Maintenance Execution, Supply Chain Resilience.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Sections 3, 4, and 5 map directly to the three sub-factors with clearly labeled headers and comprehensive coverage.
gaps: Supply Chain Resilience section lacks quantitative resilience metrics
improvement_suggestions: Add resilience KPI table (MTTR, parts availability %) in Section 5
Reference Attachment 0014 GFFE assets in resilience planning
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.50 - Technical factor decomposition matrix

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Government Furnished Facilities and Equipment (GFFE) provided per PWS tasks.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Maintenance Plan references GFFE qualitatively but lacks comprehensive inventory integration.
gaps: Missing detailed crosswalk of GFFE items to specific maintenance tasks
No condition assessment and acceptance process defined
improvement_suggestions: Create detailed table mapping each GFFE item to preventive maintenance tasks
Define condition acceptance criteria and handover process
Link GFFE status to 24-hour maintenance response capability
Reference Shipley p.65 for government furnished property management
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.65 - Government furnished property management

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Provide preventive maintenance for APS-4 equipment within 24 hours of notification.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Section 4.2 commits to 24-hour response but lacks clear trigger event definition and escalation procedures.
gaps: Does not define specific trigger event for 24-hour clock start
improvement_suggestions: Clarify that response time starts upon Government email acknowledgment receipt
Include escalation procedures for equipment access delays
Add performance tracking and reporting methodology
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.55 - Performance standard tracking matrix

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: CLIN 0001: Firm-Fixed-Price base operations support for a 366-day base period including 60-day transition.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Pricing Volume shows CLIN 0001 as single FFP line item, but transition tasks are described separately in technical narrative.
gaps: Narrative separation of transition tasks may imply separate billing structure
improvement_suggestions: Explicitly state that all transition tasks are fully included within CLIN 0001 fixed price
Clarify no additional charges for transition period activities
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.40 - Contract structure and pricing strategy

requirement_assessments.requirement_text: Key Personnel changes prohibited first 180 days without CO approval.
requirement_assessments.proposal_evidence: Key Personnel matrix lists firm commitments but lacks contingency planning for unexpected departures during restriction period.
gaps: No contingency plan for unexpected Key Personnel departure
improvement_suggestions: Add rapid replacement procedure for emergency situations
Pre-identify and pre-qualify alternate Key Personnel
Include in staffing appendix for government awareness
requirement_assessments.shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.35 - Key personnel commitment tracking

high_priority_themes.improvement_focus: GFFE integration and response time clarity
Page limit compliance and validity statement

immediate_actions: Add 180-day validity statement to transmittal letter (L002)
